comments.body: Why are we checking in the .chi files? Aren't then unnecessary is we check in the .hs?

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +-1,3 @@C->Haskell Interface Version C->Haskell Compiler, version 0.28.6 Switcheroo, 25 November 2017
